  • Method Details

    • registerAll

      public static void registerAll(com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json json)
      Registers SquidWorld's classes with the given Json object, allowing it to read and write SquidWorld types.
      Parameters:
      json - a libGDX Json object that will have serializers registered for all SquidWorld types.

    • registerWorldMapGenerators

      public static void registerWorldMapGenerators(com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json json)

    • registerEllipticalWorldMap

      public static void registerEllipticalWorldMap(com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Json json)
      Registers EllipticalWorldMap with the given Json object, so EllipticalWorldMap can be written to and read from JSON. This is a simple wrapper around EllipticalWorldMap's built-in EllipticalWorldMap.stringSerialize() and EllipticalWorldMap.recreateFromString(String) methods.
      Parameters:
      json - a libGDX Json object that will have a serializer registered
